#summary Getting Started with Android

To get started with Android you have to:
  * [http://code.google.com/android/intro/index.html Install Eclipse]
  * [http://code.google.com/android/intro/index.html Install Android SDK]
  * [http://subclipse.tigris.org/install.html Install Subversion Plugin for Eclipse]

With the Subversion Plugin in Eclipse you can download our latest version from [https://androidlocation.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ Here]
 
Please fell free to ask ANY kind of questions, this is a new Language and we are all going to be very glad to help you in any way. 

*Good tutorials in [http://www.anddev.org Andev] and also in [http://code.google.com/android Google Android]*
